name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Azure Engineer with 13+ years of experience in managing and optimizing cloud environments on **Azure**. Proficient in **Linux**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**, with a strong focus on **Cloud** administration and monitoring. Adept at ensuring compliance with SLAs and providing documentation for cloud solutions. Expert in troubleshooting and problem-solving, enhancing operational efficiency for enterprise applications. 

In addition to cloud-focused skills, I have extensive experience in full stack development utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My background includes delivering high-performance applications for the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My expertise in AI/ML-driven platforms supports predictive analytics and automation, while my MLOps knowledge encompasses model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Fluent in both German and English.
